MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G33 postcode area of Stepps, affecting properties in Alexander Avenue and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.14pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.53pm on the 22nd November 2020.
